meanings.definition: A substance that decreases sexual desire or activity.
meanings.sent1: Some animals produce an antiaphrodisiac to avoid mating.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the effects of the antiaphrodisiac on the behavior of the insects.
meanings.sent3: The antiaphrodisiac made the rabbits less interested in finding a partner.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, the antiaphrodisiac acted like a love repellent.
meanings.sent5: The antiaphrodisiac worked like a charm in reducing the mating instincts of the birds.

meanings.definition: Acting to inhibit or reduce sexual arousal or attraction.
meanings.sent1: The plant emitted an antiaphrodisiac scent to deter pollinators.
meanings.sent2: The perfume had an unexpected antiaphrodisiac effect on the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The antiaphrodisiac property of the cologne left everyone feeling indifferent.
meanings.sent4: Her words had an antiaphrodisiac impact on his romantic feelings.
meanings.sent5: The painting's colors created an antiaphrodisiac atmosphere, devoid of passion.
